name: Instagram Dark Theme v2.11 [Frequently Updated]
description:
A comprehensive dark theme for Instagram. Completely rewritten. Let me know if anything isn't skinned right!
(Right click block removed)
additional_info:
***PLEASE LEAVE COMMENTS AND RATING THANK YOU***

The theme should work fine in every language. The theme was tested on Chrome. I need Firefox and Opera users to give me feedback! I hope your eyes will appreciate my effort :)

CHANGELOG (Latest 10 updates)
v2.11
> Fixed the following/followers popups.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.10
> Fixed multiple small elements that have changed.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.09
> Fixed the Paid Partnership text for those posts.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.08
> Fixed the top bar and post container icons.
> Small elements and text fixed around the website.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.07
> Fixed the Story and Suggested container on the main page sidebar.
> Fixes for mobile view (Thanks for suggestion photomachine).
> Removed the App download prompt footer.
> Few other minor fixes.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.06
> Fixed some icons and text that wasn't skinned correctly.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.05
> Changed the body to dark to fix transparent scrollbars background (Thanks for suggestion Dokie).
> Fixed the Saved icon when clicked.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.04
> Fixed a lot of little things that broke or got added.
> IGTV elements should now be dark as well.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.03
> Fixed all icons.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.02
> Background fix.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v2.01
> Small fix for text when you have a Follow Request pending.
